column1: Uchi////Albert quickly greeted us and congratulated us on the 2 year milestone. He recommended us special things to order that they don't get often. The food
column2: as always is phenomenal. But what you don't hear on many reviews is how phenomenal the PEOPLE are. Each sushi chef engages their guests
column3: they genuinely care about you and want you to have a great experience. Albert asked us if we had any allergies
column4: was hilarious the entire time we were with him
column5: and actually cared if we were having a good time. We had just missed social hour but he made sure to get us what we wanted in time before it officially ended. He also had solid suggestions for us such as the rabbit
column7: and some other items that were just too good for words. The desserts here are also insane - we had the fried milk and a peanut butter mousse.
